    async def publish_mission(self, playwright: Playwright):
        """
        视频发布任务
        """
        # 浏览器上下文
        browser, context, page = await PlaywrightCommon(
            self._cookie_filepath).launch_browser(playwright)
        try:
            # 判断登录状态
            is_login = await self._check_login_status(page)
            if not is_login:
                return
    
            # 上传视频
            await self._upload_video(page)
            # 填写信息
            # await self._set_title(page) # 在 _set_description 处理了
            await self._set_description(page)
            if self._pub_cfg.collection_name:
                await self._set_collection(page)
            if self._pub_cfg.location:
                await self._set_location(page)
            if self._pub_cfg.visible:
                await self._set_visible(page)
            await self._set_download_permission(page)
            await self._set_publish_time(page)
            await self._set_coverage(page)
            # 发布
            if DEBUG:
                LOG.warning('调试模式下，不触发发布操作')
                return
            await self._publish(page)
        except Exception as ex:
            LOG.exception('❌❌❌《%s》发布异常 ❌❌❌', self._publish_title)
>           raise PublishFail() from ex

    async def publish_mission(self, playwright: Playwright):
        """
        视频发布任务
        """
        # 浏览器上下文
        browser, context, page = await PlaywrightCommon(
            self._cookie_filepath).launch_browser(playwright)
        try:
            # 判断登录状态
            is_login = await self._check_login_status(page)
            if not is_login:
                return
    
            # 上传视频
            await self._upload_video(page)
            # 填写信息
            # await self._set_title(page) # 在 _set_description 处理了

                await self._set_visible(page)

            await self._set_coverage(page)
            # 发布

            await self._publish(page)
        except Exception as ex:
            LOG.exception('❌❌❌《%s》发布异常 ❌❌❌', self._publish_title)
